verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:17
verses.text: And Abijah and his people slew them with a great slaughter: so there fell down slain of Israel five hundred thousand chosen men.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:18
verses.text: Thus the children of Israel were brought under at that time, and the children of Judah prevailed, because they relied upon the Lord God of their fathers.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:19
verses.text: And Abijah pursued after Jeroboam, and took cities from him, Beth–el with the towns thereof, and Jeshanah with the towns thereof, and Ephrain with the towns thereof.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 13:20
verses.text: Neither did Jeroboam recover strength again in the days of Abijah: and the Lord struck him, and he died.
